history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: nat,Rabs,ex_lim_seq_ext. qsimpl time: 1 use: nat,Rabs,ex_lim_seq_ext,Rabs_minus_sym.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - l) + Rabs l).
exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R l : Rbar H : is_lim_seq u l Unable to unify "ex_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - l) + Rabs l)" with "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) (Rabs l)".
Found no subterm matching "Rabs (?M2659 - ?M2658)" in the current goal.

original: intros [l H]. exists (Rabs l). apply ex_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n : nat => Rabs (u n - l) + Rabs l). - intros n. rewrite <- Rabs_minus_sym, Rabs_minus. ring. - apply ex_lim_seq_plus. + now apply is_lim_seq'_correct in H as H'; apply Lim_seq_correct in H; apply is_lim_seq_ext_loc with (2 := H). + now apply is_lim_seq_const.
